name: KidneyHealth_EstimatedGlomerularFiltrationRateLabTestHDSNOMED
title: Kidney Health_Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate Lab Test HD SNOMED
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Kidney Health Screening For Diabetes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Kidney Health Screening For Diabetes for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath),(Data Element Scope: Kidney Health Screening For Diabetes care need for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate Lab Test SNOMED Codes that constitute the Kidney Health Screening For Diabetes care need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Isotope study for glomerular filtration rate (procedure)
Technetium-99m-diethylenetriamine pentaacetic acid clearance - glomerular filtration rate (procedure)
Measurement of creatinine concentration in serum or plasma specimen with calculation of glomerular filtration rate (procedure)
Calculation of quantitative volume rate of glomerular filtration based on creatinine concentration in serum or plasma specimen (procedure)
Calculation of ratio of maximum rate of tubular reabsorption of phosphate to glomerular filtration rate (procedure)
Radionuclide non-imaging glomerular filtration rate estimation study (procedure)
Chromium 51 labeled ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid clearance study (procedure)
